text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump WHO recognized the virus on 12/31/19, the 1st death in China occurred on 1/11/20, @realDonaldTrump didn’t lockdown borders from China until 1/31/20, didn’t stop travel from the EU until 3/11/20, a full 12 days after he called the virus a hoax. #2019nCoV #COVID19

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

entity.name: Travel Actions
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
